titleStmt.title: The tryal and sentence of Elizabeth Cellier for writing, printing and publishing a scandalous libel called, Malice defeated &c., at the sesions in the Old-Bailey, held Saturday the 11th and Monday the 13th of Sept., 1680 whereunto is added several depositions made before the Right Honorable the Lord Mayor.
titleStmt.author: Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.
England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
